(\{ (\{ 4, 2 \}), (\{ "h3", "Our Curriculum" \}), (\{ "paragraph", "We at the Goldengate school for Youths hope to offer the children of the docks a diverse selection of lessons to prepare them for life within the docktown, we hope to tutor any child that is entrusted to us for lessons in a legal proffession that will benefit them in later life." \}), (\{ "paragraph", "We currently offer lessons on:\
\\r\\n\Academics~\\
\\r\\nLiterature \
\\r\\nMathematics \
\\r\\nPhilosophy and Religion \
\\r\\nHistory \
\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\Languages~\\
\\r\\nCat \
\\r\\nOld \
\\r\\nOthers on request\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\Proffessional Skills~ \\
\\r\\nBlacksmithing (See Bruno) \
\\r\\nBodyguarding \
\\r\\nFishing \
\\r\\nBanking (On request)\
\\r\\nScholar career \
\\r\\nCarpentry\\r\\n" \}), (\{ "page", "Introduction Page", "guest" \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})

Venion Roggerison" \}), (\{ "paragraph", "Teachers:\
\\r\\nShaer - Etiquette \
\\r\\nBruno - Smithing \
\\r\\nKaitlyn - Music" \}), (\{ "members_list", "" \}), (\{ "h3", "Guild Inventory" \}), (\{ "inventory", "" \}), (\{ "page", "Staff Training", "staff training" \}), (\{ "page", "Teacher Message Board", "teacher message board" \}), (\{ "page", "Market Information", "trading" \}), (\{ "page", "School Expenses Log", "guild expenses" \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}), (\{ "ring_listing", "" \}) \})

(\{ (\{ 6, 2 \}), (\{ "h3", "Our Sponsors" \}), (\{ "paragraph", "The school's teachers work only as volunteers and so any payment they receive is through the donations of members of the public. Though applying for funding from a major House is still under debate, the school survives on donations for now." \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})

(\{ (\{ 6, 2 \}), (\{ "paragraph", "The Goldengate School was originally Founded by Dio Goldengate, though now owned by Venion Roggerison. The school has cut all ties with the Goldengate House however the Schools aims are still the same: to help educate the growing population of youths in Docktown, to make sure that these children all have a fair start in life." \}), (\{ "paragraph", "Due to the recent happenings inside the Chapel, the school no longer has it's main base, which was in the spare room on the first floor of the Chapel. The teacher trainer is now located in the lounge of the boarding house and some lessons may be postponed." \}), (\{ "paragraph", "Anyone interested in having their child tutored should send a letter to Venion." \}), (\{ "page", "Our Curriculum", "curriculum" \}), (\{ "page", "Our Sponsors", "funding" \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})
